        public CompletedCheckpointStore createCheckpointStore(JobID jobId,
                                                      int maxNumberOfCheckpointsToRetain,
                                                      java.lang.ClassLoader userClassLoader)
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: CheckpointRecoveryFactory
        Creates a CompletedCheckpointStore instance for a job.
        指定者:
        createCheckpointStore 在接口中 CheckpointRecoveryFactory
        参数:
        jobId - Job ID to recover checkpoints for
        maxNumberOfCheckpointsToRetain - Maximum number of checkpoints to retain
        userClassLoader - User code class loader of the job
        返回:
        CompletedCheckpointStore instance for the job
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
